title: Episode 28 - Screenwriter Michael Starrbury
itunes:title: Screenwriter Michael Starrbury
description: Michael Starburry is a screenwriter and actor known for the film The Inevitable Defeat of Mister and Pete, which starred Jennifer Hudson and Anthony Mackie, and the animated series Legends of Chamberlain Heights which has run for two seasons on Comedy Central and for which Michael voices one of the characters. In 2014, First Lady Michelle Obama screened The Inevitable Defeat of Mister & Pete at the White House.

In 2014, First Lady Michelle Obama screened The Inevitable Defeat of Mister & Pete at the White House.
